## FloatMatrix.getDiagonal() method

Returns a vector containing the elements of the main diagonal of the matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDiagonal(): Vector<number>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Vector](./vector.vector.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt;

The vector of diagonal entries
